title: Mbuluzi Game Reserve
text:
Mbuluzi Game Reserve is a privately owned reserve in <a href="Eswatini">Eswatini</a>, within the <a href="Lubombo%20Conservancy">Lubombo Conservancy</a>. There are 3 lodges privately situated on the <a href="Mlawula%20River">Mlawula River</a>, and a campsite, situated above some rapids in the <a href="Mbuluzi%20River">Mbuluzi River</a>.
Wildlife.
Large wildlife species present in the reserve include <a href="South%20African%20giraffe">South African giraffe</a>s, <a href="plains%20zebra">plains zebra</a>s, <a href="black%20wildebeest">black wildebeest</a>s, <a href="kudu">kudu</a>s, <a href="nyala">nyala</a>s, <a href="bushbuck">bushbuck</a>s, <a href="waterbuck">waterbuck</a>s, <a href="impala">impala</a>, <a href="common%20warthog">warthog</a>s, <a href="Nile%20crocodile">crocodile</a>s, <a href="vervet%20monkey">vervet monkey</a>s, <a href="Chacma%20baboon">vhacma baboon</a>s, <a href="common%20duiker">common duiker</a>s. Also occasionally seen are <a href="hippotamus">hippopotami</a>, <a href="bushpig">bushpig</a>s, <a href="Cape%20Clawless%20Otter">Cape clawless otter</a>s, and <a href="Red%20Duiker">red duiker</a>s.
